entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening and after midnight. A few flurries or rain showers beginning after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
